BOOL NKTItem::IsNew (  )  [inline]

Returns TRUE if the contact was created and wasn't saved yet

LPENTRYID NKTItem::GetEntryID (  ) 

Get unique identifier of the object. This function returns NULL if it's a new object and it wasn't saved.

ULONG NKTItem::GetEntryIDSize (  ) 

Get unique identifier size of the object. This function returns 0 if it's a new object and it wasn't saved.

Returns TRUE if the specified tag exists.

Returns the string that represents the property tag or a empty string if doesn't exist.

bstr_t NKTItem::GetShortEntryIDOrBlank (  ) 

Get the last 4 bytes of the entry id. This id is a unique identifier of each wab item.

BOOL NKTItem::IsValid (  ) 

Returns TRUE if the contact is valid. New contacts are not valid until saved.

void NKTItem::Save (  ) 

Save changed properties to the object. If the object is new it's stored.

ULONG NKTItem::GetObjectType (  )  [inline]

Get object type: MAPI_ABCONT, MAPI_DISTLIST or MAPI_MAILUSER

void NKTItem::SetObjectType ( ULONG  objType  )  [inline]

Set object type: MAPI_ABCONT, MAPI_DISTLIST or MAPI_MAILUSER

SBinaryArray * NKTItem::GetDistributionListArray (  ) 

Only useful when the item is a MAPI_DISTLIST object. It returns a SBinaryArray that contains a list of short entry id (only the last 4 bytes) that are the members of the distribution list. The returned array will exist while this object is alive.

void NKTItem::AppendEntryIDToDistList ( LPENTRYID  lpContactEntryID,
ULONG  cbContactEntryID
